midi-qol-relics.ItemDeleteCheck.Name: Item Delete Check
midi-qol-relics.ItemDeleteCheck.Hint: Open a confirmation dialog when trying to delete items from character sheet
midi-qol-relics.DamageImmunities.Name: Apply Damage immunities
midi-qol-relics.DamageImmunities.Hint: When using midi-qol-relics damage buttons or auto applying damage apply target's damage immunities/vulnerabilities/resistances. All damage types are checked.
midi-qol-relics.SpeedItemRolls.Name: Enable Speed Item Rolls
midi-qol-relics.SpeedAbilityRolls.Name: Enable Speed Ability (save/check/skill) Rolls
midi-qol-relics.SpeedItemRolls.Blurb: You can assign (ctrl|cmd)/alt/shift mouse click modifiers how you want. Double up Advantage/Disadvantage/Versatile at your peril. Default: Adv = Alt, Disadv = Ctl, Versatile = Shift, Crit = Alt. Note pressing Advantage+Disdvantage when clicking will fast forward a normal roll. (Does not work with Better Rolls)
midi-qol-relics.ShowItemDetails.Name: Show Item details in chat card
midi-qol-relics.ShowItemDetails.Hint: If set the item details will be displayed in the chat card. You can use the RELICS system setting to auto hide the description
midi-qol-relics.AutoRollAttack.Name: When item is rolled, automatically roll the attack if there is one
midi-qol-relics.AutoRollAttack.Hint: When the attack is rolled the auto fast forward roll settings are used to decide what to do
midi-qol-relics.AutoFastForward.Name: Auto fast forward rolls
midi-qol-relics.AutoFastForward.Hint: When rolling attack or damage always fast forward rolls also applies when clicking on attack/damage buttons
midi-qol-relics.AutoCheckHit.Name: Auto check if attack hits target
midi-qol-relics.AutoCheckHit.Hint: Check if an attack roll hits selected targets - damage is rolled if one or more targets is hit and auto roll damage is enabled. If disabled midi-qol-relics will assume the attack hits and continue rolling.
midi-qol-relics.RequiresTargets.Name: Require targets to be selected
midi-qol-relics.RequiresTargets.Hint: Require tokens to be targeted before rolls. Never mans ignore, In Combat means only in combat and always whenver an item with targets is rolled. Does not work with better rolls
midi-qol-relics.AutoApplyDamage.Name: Auto apply damage to target
midi-qol-relics.AutoApplyDamage.Hint: Auto apply damage to hit targets (if autocheck hits on) or targets user has selected
midi-qol-relics.ItemRollButtons.Name: Add attack/damage buttons to item inventory list
midi-qol-relics.ItemRollButtons.Hint: Add Roll Buttons to item description - these buttons support ctl/alt/shift to skip the dialog
midi-qol-relics.AddChatDamageButtons.Nam: Add damage buttons to chat message
midi-qol-relics.AddChatDamageButtons.Hin: Add Damage buttons to any damage roll chat message - clicking applies damage to all selected tokens (NOT TARGETED) (the same as the drop down menu)
midi-qol-relics.AutoRollDamage.Name: Auto roll Damage
midi-qol-relics.AutoRollDamage.Hint: Automatically roll Damage when an attack roll is made. If auto roll damage is set to attack-hits it will roll damage if no targets are selected, the attack hits (see auto check hits) or hits are not being checked
midi-qol-relics.AutoCheckSaves.Name: Auto check Saves
midi-qol-relics.AutoCheckSaves.Hint: Automatically check saving throws when a saving throw is required. If disabled it will assume that all targets failed their save.
midi-qol-relics.DisplaySaveDC.Name: Display Saving throw DC
midi-qol-relics.DisplaySaveDC.Hint: If false hide the DC of the saving throw from the players (Merge card only)
midi-qol-relics.AutoRemoveTargets.Name: Untarget at end of turn
midi-qol-relics.AutoRemoveTargets.Hint: At the end of you turn choose which targets to automatically untarget
midi-qol-relics.noItemNamed: Your selected token does not have an item named
midi-qol-relics.noTokens: Cannot apply effect - no token selected
midi-qol-relics.HideNPCNames.Name: Hide token names
midi-qol-relics.HideNPCNames.Hint: Hide token names in hit/save chat messages
midi-qol-relics.AutoTarget.Name: Auto target on template draw
midi-qol-relics.AutoTarget.Hint: When placing a template (e.g. spell) auto target tokens inside the template.
midi-qol-relics.noGM: No GM user connected cannot apply effects/update Hit Points
midi-qol-relics.showGM.Name: GM Sees all whispered messages
midi-qol-relics.showGM.Hint: GM sees all whispered messages sent even if the game settings say the GM won't see them
midi-qol-relics.ColoredBorders.Name: Colored Border Messages
midi-qol-relics.ColoredBorders.Hint: Each chat message has a border in the player characters color
midi-qol-relics.AutoEffects.Name: Auto apply item effects to targets
midi-qol-relics.AutoEffects.Hint: Automatically apply item active effects to targets if they are hit, failed a save or don't get a save. Requires dynamiceffects and works better with about-time and or times-up as well.
midi-qol-relics.RangeTarget.Name: Auto target for ranged target spells/attacks
midi-qol-relics.RangeTarget.Hint: Auto target for ranged target types if the target type is creature/enemy/ally
midi-qol-relics.PlayerRollSaves.Name: Prompt Players to Roll Saves
midi-qol-relics.PlayerRollSaves.Hint: Players Roll saves. A whispered chat message or can use LMRTFY if installed.
midi-qol-relics.rollNPCSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Unlinked)
midi-qol-relics.rollNPCLinkedSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Linked)
midi-qol-relics.rollNPCSaves.Hint: Auto means the module will roll the save for the NPC, otherwise the GM will receive an LMRTFY prompt.
midi-qol-relics.PlayerSaveTimeout.Name: Delay before rolling for players
midi-qol-relics.PlayerSaveTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before taking over the player's save for them in seconds
midi-qol-relics.PreRollChecks.Name: Experimental: Apply checks before doing speed/macro roll
midi-qol-relics.PreRollChecks.Hint: Experimental: Checks before doing an item roll; currently in range and roller has > 0 HP
midi-qol-relics.noTargets: You must target a token before rolling the attack
midi-qol-relics.wrongNumberTargets: You must target at most {allowedTargets} token(s) before rolling the attack
midi-qol-relics.UseTokenNames.Name: Chat cards use token name
midi-qol-relics.UseTokenNames.Hint: Chat card titles and target names use the token name rather than the actor name
midi-qol-relics.CriticalDamage.Name: Choose how to roll critical damage
midi-qol-relics.CriticalDamage.Hint: requires foundry 0.7.0 or later. Relics Default - standard relics critical roll, base max only - base weapon dice only (no critical dice) but all maximised, max critical dice - critical dice maximised, max all dice - wepon + critical dice maximised, double dice value - result of dice x2
midi-qol-relics.MergeCard.Name: Merge Rolls to one card
midi-qol-relics.MergeCard.Hint: Merge Attack, Hits, Damage, Saves to a single chat card
midi-qol-relics.MergeCardCondensed.Name: Condense Attack/Damage Rolls
midi-qol-relics.MergeCardCondensed.Hint: Conserve a little chat log space by making attack and damage rolls smaller
midi-qol-relics.CheckSaveText.Name: Search spell description
midi-qol-relics.CheckSaveText.Hint: Search spell description for save type - 'half as much damage'. If unchecked assume a save does 1/2 damage
midi-qol-relics.noAttackRoll: You must roll the attack before rolling the damage
midi-qol-relics.Hint: Configure the various workflow settings for midi-qol-relics. Be warned there are lots of them
midi-qol-relics.DiceSound.Name: Attack Roll
midi-qol-relics.CriticalSound.Name: Critical Hit
midi-qol-relics.FumbleSound.Name: Fumble
midi-qol-relics.DiceSounds.Hint: Sound to play for different sorts of rolls. ONLY applies to the combo card
midi-qol-relics.WeaponUseSound.Name: Weapon Use
midi-qol-relics.SpellUseSound.Name: Spell Use
midi-qol-relics.PotionUseSound.Name: Potion Use
midi-qol-relics.ItemUseSound.Name: Item Use
midi-qol-relics.AutoFastForwardAbilityRo: Clicking on an ability to start a check/save or a skill roll will auto fast forward
midi-qol-relics.UseCustomSounds.Name: Enable midi-qol-relics custom sounds
midi-qol-relics.UseCustomSounds.Hint: If set will override system sounds with the sounds below.
midi-qol-relics:Debug.Name: Enable Debug
midi-qol-relics:Debug.Hint: 'Warnings' gives an overview of activity, 'debug' adds more info and 'all' turns on CONFIG.debug.hooks as well

midi-qol-relics.rollNPCSavesOptions.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol-relics.playerRollSavesOptions.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol-relics.playerRollSavesOptionsRe.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol-relics.AutoRemoveTargetsOptions.all: untarget all at end of turn

midi-qol-relics.hideRollDetailsOptions.detailsDSN: Roll Formula but show DSN roll

midi-qol-relics.DoReactions.Name: Check PLAYER reactions
midi-qol-relics.DoReactions.Hint: Give an attacked actor the option to use a reaction before adjudicating the roll
midi-qol-relics.GMDoReactions.Name: Check NPC/GM reactions
midi-qol-relics.ReactionTimeout.Name: Reaction check timeout
midi-qol-relics.ReactionTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before assuming no reaction has been taken
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.Name: GM Roll details hiding
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.Hint: Choose how much of GM rolls to hide/show to players

midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.detailsDSN: Roll Formula but show DSN: Hide the roll formulas but still roll DSN dice
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.details: Roll Formula: hide the roll formula and don't show DSN dice
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.d20Only: Show Attack d20 + damage total: Show the attack d20 Roll and damage total only
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.hitDamage: Show Hit/Miss + damage total: Show hit/miss plus the damage total
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.d20attackOnly: Show attack D20 Only: Show the d20 attack dice only
midi-qol-relics.HideRollDetails.HintLong.all: Entire Roll: hide all roll details from the players

midi-qol-relics.ForceHideRoll.Name: Really Hide private/blind/self rolls
midi-qol-relics.ForceHideRoll.Hint: Display nothing to non-recipients for private/blind/self rolls. Thanks to felix.mueller.86@web.de
midi-qol-relics.EnableWorkflow.Name: Enable roll automation support
midi-qol-relics.EnableWorkflow.Hint: If enabled automation of rolls can be configured in the Workflow Settings panel
midi-qol-relics.Debug.Name: Enable debug
midi-qol-relics.Debug.Hint: Set to None unless you want to fill up the console log. All enables CONFIG.hooks.debug
midi-qol-relics.AllowUseMacro.Name: Add macro to call on use
midi-qol-relics.AllowUseMacro.Hint: When enabled adds a macro name field which will be called on use. See the Readme for the details
midi-qol-relics.DragDropTarget.Name: Drag and Drop Targeting
midi-qol-relics.DragDropTarget.Hint: Allow dragging an item onto a token to attack it
midi-qol-relics.AutoAttack.Name: Auto roll attack
midi-qol-relics.AutoDamage.Name: Auto roll damage
midi-qol-relics.ItemList: Choose items which display details on item card
midi-qol-relics.RollOtherDamage.Name: Roll Other formula if present for rwak/mwak
midi-qol-relics.RollOtherDamage.Hint: Off = Don't roll Other damage automatically. ifSave = only roll the Other damage if the item has a save. Activation = roll the Other damage if the activation condition is empty or evaluates to true
midi-qol-relics.RemoveButtons.Name: Remove chat card buttons after roll
midi-qol-relics.ActiveConcentrationSpell: You are already concentrating. End concentration and continue?
If enabled will handle concentration management via midi-qol-relics, requires auto check saves to be enabled. Will disable CUB concentration management
If enabled and the attack is rolling normal damage + a save + other/versatile damage only roll a single concentration check for the combined damage
midi-qol-relics.DamageMacro.Name: Bonus Damage Macros
midi-qol-relics.DamageMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating damage which will be applied when calculating damage to targets
midi-qol-relics.AttackMacro.Name: Attack Bonus Macros
midi-qol-relics.AttackMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating attack roll which will be applied when checking if the attack hit the targets
midi-qol-relics.OptionalRules.Name: (EXPERIMENTAL) Optional Game Rules Work with better rolls, but triggers a libWrapper warning
midi-qol-relics.OptionalRules.Hint: RELICS Game rules that you may wish to enable. Generally don't work with better rolls.
midi-qol-relics.InvisAdvantage.Name: Hidden/Invisible attackers have advantage on attacks (requires CUB or CV)
midi-qol-relics.CheckRange.Name: Check weapon range when attacking
midi-qol-relics.NearbyFoe.Name: Ranged attacks when a foe is closer than this have disadvantage. 0 disables
midi-qol-relics.WallsBlockRange.Name: Walls block ranged attacks
midi-qol-relics.WallsBlockRange.Hint:
Walls block ranged attacks (4 point checks require DND Helpers module)
 none = no effect, center = check center to center line, center + Levels = center check but use `levels module` to determine wallk blocking, 4 point check blocked if no corner visible, 4 point check adjusts AC according to cover
midi-qol-relics.NearbyAllyRanged.Name: (House Rule) Ranged Attacks at foes near allies have disadvantage.
midi-qol-relics.NearbyAllyRanged.Hint: Ranged Attacks with allies nearby (5 feet) to the target have disadvantage for targets smaller than this (w*h). 0 disables
midi-qol-relics.Incapacitated.Name: Incapacitated actors can't make attacks
midi-qol-relics.RemoveHiddenInvis.Name: Attacking removes hidden/invisible (requires Conditional Visibility or CUB)
midi-qol-relics.CriticalSaves.Name: Critical/Fumble always succeed/fail for saving throws
midi-qol-relics.MaxDRValue.Name: (House rule) Enabling this means that only the most effective Damage Reduction will apply. Off means DR accumulates
midi-qol-relics.KeepRollStats.Name: Keep Roll Statistics
midi-qol-relics.KeepRollStats.Hint: Record attack and damage roll data for actors
midi-qol-relics.SaveStatsEvery.Name: Save statisticss Every
midi-qol-relics.SaveStatsEvery.Hint: Save statistics every N rolls. Each attack and damage counts as a roll. Suggest 10-20 or greater
midi-qol-relics.PlayerStatsOnly.Name: Player statistics only
midi-qol-relics.PlayerStatsOnly.Hint: Only keep statistics for player owned actors
midi-qol-relics.DefaultSaveMult.Name: Default saving throw multiplier
midi-qol-relics.DefaultSaveMult.Hint: If there are no other modifiers a saving throw will do this fraction of the damage of the origianl attack. Default 0.5, half damage on save. You should only change this if you know how multipliers work
midi-qol-relics.RequireMagical.Name: Require 'Magical' property
midi-qol-relics.RequireMagical.Hint: If enabled, only weapons with 'Magical' property set do magical damage
midi-qol-relics.RemoveConcentration.Name: Remove concentration on failed save
midi-qol-relics.RemoveConcentration.Hint: If enabled concentration will be removed on a failed save when damage taken otherwise must be removed manually
midi-qol-relics.UsePlayerPortrait.Name: Use Actor portrait in chat cards
midi-qol-relics.UsePlayerPortrait.Hint: For Actors of type charactrer use the actor portrait instead of the token image in midi-qol-relics chat cards
midi-qol-relics.DistanceIncludesHeight.N: Include height difference in distance calcs
midi-qol-relics.NoSocketLib: Midi-qol requires socketlib installed and enabled
midi-qol-relics.NoCubInstalled: You have enabled midi-qol-relics concentration automation. This requires that you install and activate Combat Utility Belt as well. Concentration Automation will be disalbed.
midi-qol-relics.ExportConfig: Export midi-qol-relics settings to json file
midi-qol-relics.ImportConfig: Import midi-qol-relics settings from json file
midi-qol-relics.ExportJSon: Export Roll Stats to Json file
midi-qol-relics.ExportCSV: Export Roll Stats to CSV file
midi-qol-relics.AutoCEEffects.Name: Apply Convenient Effects
midi-qol-relics.AutoCEEffects.Hint: Apply convenient effects which match item name when item used. Requires auto apply active effects enabled as well.
midi-qol-relics.NoChangelogs: Midi-qol supports and recommends the ChangeLogs module to show you any changes since you last updated
